content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5)

### Copper Ore Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5)
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to a Wooden Chest at position (-24.5, -67.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-20.0, -70.0) and (-18.0, -70.0)

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5)
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to a Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-20.5, -66.5) and (-17.5, -64.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-19.0, -65.0) and (-21.0, -62.0)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-20.5, -63.5) and (-16.5, -64.5)

### Iron Ore Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) with inventory containing iron ore

### Miscellaneous Structures
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) connected to Wooden Chests at positions (1.5, 0.5) and (3.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Specifically, the transport belt could not be placed at position (-14.5, -54.5) due to an existing wooden chest.

### NameError due to undefined class
- Ensure all necessary classes or entities are defined before using them in the code. The error occurred when checking if an entity is an instance of the 'Chest' class, which was not defined.
